faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Find answers to common questions about our platform.

questions.question: How is randomness guaranteed?
questions.answer: We use Chainlink VRF (Verifiable Random Function) to ensure fair and provably random number generation.

questions.question: When do I receive my winnings?
questions.answer: Winnings are automatically sent to your wallet immediately after the draw.

questions.question: What cryptocurrencies are accepted?
questions.answer: We currently accept USDC on multiple networks including Ethereum and Polygon.

questions.question: How do I verify the results?
questions.answer: All draws are recorded on the blockchain and can be verified through our explorer.
